thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 8 of 218
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Customer service is the best, The device is perfect not like the ones people told me about, even a min or two after brushing my teeth the device worked great no alarms went off the location intoxalock sent me to was wonderful the guy was so helpful that showed me how to use the device said when it's ready for you to blow do it with out any pauses just quick blow breath blow all in one motion. I recommend it if you need it.
